text: Nǐ [duì tāmen] shuō:“Nǐmen gàosù wǒ ba! Nǐmen shě ān lā ér qíqiú de zhǔzǎi, nǐmen zhǐ gěi wǒ kàn ba! Tāmen zài dà dìshàng chuàngzàole shénme? Tāmen zēng shēn yǔ chuàngzào zhū tiān de nǎ yībùfèn [zhù]? Háishì wǒ céng cìyǔ tāmen yī bù jīngdiǎn, tāmen yī jīngdiǎn zhōng de míngzhèng xíngshì ne?” Bù, bù yì zhě zhǐ yǐ qīpiàn hùxiāng xǔnuò.
